projects.title: Atom
projects.description: Multiplayer project combining the use of a video projector, a kinect and a falcon haptic arm. One player is on a simulated version of Windows and must browse through files (text and audio) in search of clues.The second player has to draw symbols using the kinect so that the falcon haptic arm can retransmit them on paper.

projects.title: Rokurokubi
projects.description: Real-time stylized scene based on a Japanese myth. Modeling, texturing, integration and lighting.

projects.title: Explosive Treats
projects.description: Development of a mobile app. Trailer creation.

projects.title: Asymmetric VR/AR gameplay application
projects.description: Development of a multiplayer tower defense between a VR player (defender) and an AR player (attacker). Modeling, VFX, animations and gameplay.

projects.title: personal game project
projects.description: Development of a game on Unreal Engine 5. Creation of the environment on Blender and ZBrush. Development of an animation system for an avatar. Still under development.

projects.title: 3D modeling and texturing
projects.description: Learning to model detailed objects/avatars on Blender. Texturing on Substance Painter.You can find them on sketchfab
projects.embeded: <iframe title='Space Marine Blood Angels'  xr-spatial-tracking' xr-spatial-tracking execution-while-out-of-viewport execution-while-not-rendered web-share src='https://sketchfab.com/models/4497c03e892344da8d7266c2c9d30678/embed'> </iframe>

projects.title: Blacksmith game
projects.description: Project realized in 3 days to develop a virtual reality game consisting in creating objects from materials.

projects.title: Multiplayer Zombie Game
projects.description: Project realized in 3 days to learn how to use Unity NetCode which allows to develop multiplayer games on Unity.

projects.title: Cycleo World
projects.description:
Project realized during an internship at HRV. Creation of a virtual bike ride application.

Management of the game mechanics and communication with the electronic card of the real bike.

projects.title: 3D modeling and texturing
projects.description: First time learning to model avatars in lowpoly on Blender.

projects.title: Stellarium
projects.description: Passionate about astronomy, the goal was to create an educational and fun tool to discover astronomy using virtual reality. Several workshops allow the user to learn more about the constellations and their history.

projects.title: Shoot 'Em Up
projects.description: Project realized during a Game jam of 2 weeks. The goal was to realize a complete Shoot 'Em Up by realizing the game mechanics, animations/VFX and some of the 3D models.

projects.title: Electric scooter simulator in virtual reality
projects.description:
Project carried out in collaboration with the Japanese University of Tama and the French research laboratory PISC-L.

Presented at the student competition at Laval Virtual 2021.

Electric scooter simulator in virtual reality. It is an application that allows us to reproduce the sensations experienced while riding a scooter.

For this, we use 2 motors communicating with Unity through an ESP32 electronic board. We can thus recreate the sensations of speed, turn and slope.

projects.title: Fractals Generator
projects.description: Fractal generation and customization project to learn how to program vertex and fragment shaders on Unity3D.

projects.title: Procedural land generation
projects.description: Project to discover how a procedural generation of a terrain can be done. Use of the A* algorithm to create rivers.
